verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, rebuke \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thine anger, neither chasten \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H1732"\w* hot displeasure.

\w Have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H2534"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* withered away: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, heal \w me|strong="H3256"\w*; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3068"\w* vexed.

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sore vexed: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* long?

Return, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*: \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* lovingkindnessâ€™ sake.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no remembrance \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H7725"\w*: \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w thee|strong="H7725"\w* thanks?

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am weary \w with|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* groaning; \w every|strong="H3588"\w* night \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bed \w to|strong="H3588"\w* swim; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* water \w my|strong="H3588"\w* couch \w with|strong="H7585"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* tears.

Mine eye wasteth \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* grief; \w it|strong="H3915"\w* waxeth old \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* mine adversaries.

Depart \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* ye workers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* iniquity; \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H5869"\w* heard \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* weeping.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* supplication; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* receive \w my|strong="H8085"\w* prayer.

\w All|strong="H3947"\w* mine enemies \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* sore vexed: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w back|strong="H3947"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed suddenly.
